title: Trump, coin, your 401k: ETFs are one way to trade crypto for long-term investing
description: President Trump wants more cryptocurrency in 401(k) retirement saving plans. ETFs already offer an easy way to buy digital assets like bitcoin, but risks vary.

title: Trump Turns 401(k)s Into Crypto Machines
description: A new executive order could funnel billions from American retirement accounts into Bitcoin and other digital assets, a massive win for the crypto industry and a huge new risk for your savings.

title: Bitcoin jumps as Trump is set to sign an order that allows cryptocurrencies in 401(k)s
description: The crypto market jumped Thursday on excitement that bitcoin and other digital assets could soon be coming to 401(k) retirement plans.
